text: Your WiFi will betray you at the worst possible moment.
Hindi ka iniwan, nagpalit lang ng kasama.
A surprise blessing is already on its way to you.
Ang ganda mo nga, pero late ka pa rin lagi.
Yes, keep procrastinating… success will totally wait for you.
Kahit gaano kabigat ang araw, kaya mo pa ring ngumiti.
Not everything shiny is gold. Be cautious today.
May isang tao na palaging masaya kapag naririnig ang pangalan mo.
Don’t test your luck today — even your charger might betray you.
Bawat pagkatalo ay hakbang papunta sa panalo.
